<b> Version 1.3.2: </b> <br />
<b> Bug fixes: </b> <br />
- Fixing pokemons with "-" in their abilities (eg: Magearna) not being imported/read correctly <br />
- Data files update <br />

<b> Version 1.3.1: </b> <br />
<b> Bug fixes: </b> <br />
- Mega icons <br />
- Fixing doubles in 1v1 situation <br />
- Tier updates <br />

<b> Version 1.3.0: </b> <br />
<b> New features: </b> <br />
- The Sun&Moon compatibility update <br />
